title: Large House and land for sale in an ideal location in Kandy
details:
Situated in Halloluwa: 10 mins to Peradeniya, 10 mins to Katugasthota and 15 mins to Kurunegala road.

Very large, solidly build art-deco house with 7 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, large garage with driver's quarters on 205 perches of land with precious spice and fruit trees.

Close to the new Kandy-Colombo expressway.

The house is in good structural condition, but needs repairs as it's not been occupied for a long time. Selling for land value only.

The property has 2 sections: 1) The house with a large amount of land to the rear, heading to the hills. 2) The garage/driver's quarters with a large amount of land to the rear heading to the paddy fields. The main road goes in-between the garage and the house.

This is an ideal investment as land prices are expected to soar when the new Expressway is finished in 2019/2020.
